text: wystejlk almkdhdhibwn baleqwbt alty lm aeajlhm biha qabl al'iiman aldhy yrja bih al'aman walhsnat, waqad madat euqubat almukadhibin min qblhm, fkyf la yaetabirun bhm? wa'iina rabak -ayha alrswl- ladhw maghfirat ldhnwb man tab min dhnwbh min alnaas ealaa zlmhm, yaftah lahum bab almghfrt, wydewhm 'ilyha, wahum yazlimun 'anfusahum besyanhm rbhm, wa'iina rabak lashadid aleiqab ealaa man asrr ealaa alkufr waldalal wmesyt allh
